actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an income tax credit for certain repairs or improvements of the residence of a taxpayer which improve the thermal design of such residence.

summary.text: Allows an income tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for repairs or improvements of the residence of a taxpayer which improve the thermal design of such residence. Places limitations on the amount of such credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an income tax credit for certain repairs or improvements of the residence of a taxpayer which improve the thermal design of such residence.
